caption.center: STATE ex rel. Clarence SOPHUS v. STATE of Louisiana.

opinion.posture: In re Sophus, Clarence; â€” Plaintiff; Applying For Supervisory and/or Remedial Writs, Parish of St. Mary, 16th Judicial District Court Div. A, Nos. 177,047, 111,644, 150,279; to the Court of Appeal, First Circuit, No. 2008 KW 1851.
opinion.opinion_text: Denied. La.C.Cr.P. art. 930.8; State ex rel. Glover v.State, 93-2330 (La.9/5/95), 660 So.2d 1189; La.C.Cr.P. art. 351.
